long_description: The extra-small size REI eCycle Food Container is the perfect size for a serving of yogurt, applesauce or dips. Made from recycled and recyclable polypropylene plastic; polypropylene plastic is 100% BPA free. Leakproof lid keeps your lunch from spilling on the way to work. X-small size container holds 4 fl. oz. Nests within other sizes of eCycle containers (sold separately). REI eCycle Food Container is dishwasher and microwave safe.
short_description: The extra-small size REI eCycle Food Container is the perfect size for a serving of yogurt, applesauce or dips.
